sentences.sentence: During my whole report, he sat with his eyes closed and his fingers interlaced.
sentences.translation: 在我整个的报告过程中，他坐着、闭着眼，手指交错。

sentences.sentence: Her hair was interlaced with ribbons and flowers.
sentences.translation: 她的头发上编扎着缎带和花。

sentences.sentence: Put your other hand on top of the first with your fingers interlaced.
sentences.translation: 将另外一只手放在第一只手的上面并且十指交错。
